messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: cheryl

**If you run across sheet music for "Concerning Hobbits" from the LOTR
soundtrack, please let me know.**

Yes, I've searched also and with no success. I've been playing parts by ear on my violin, but would really like to find the music. I'll keep my eyes open.

Kelli~



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Shire Music (was: the why question and ocarinas)
messages.msgSnippet: If you run across sheet music for Concerning Hobbits from the LOTR soundtrack, please let me know.  I ve searched everywhere.  It s a very pretty
messages.messageBody:
If you run across sheet music for "Concerning Hobbits" from the LOTR
soundtrack, please let me know. I've searched everywhere. It's a very
pretty Shire-sounding song.
Cheryl N


Now I have that to learn and some of the Shire/hobbit music from Lord of
the Rings. <g>
>
> Kelli~
